Class.ClassComment: Mutable /** * Must be implemented by any SESSION or CONVERSATION scoped mutable JavaBean component that will be used in a clustered environment. If this interface is not implemented correctly, changes may not be replicated across the cluster (depending upon the servlet engine implementation). * @author Gavin King */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Get and clear the dirty flag. * @return true if the instance is dirty and requires replication */
